cob(label=None, icon='far fa-calendar-alt', color=None, htmlCode=None, profile=None, options=None, helper=None)¶

This component is based on the Jquery Date Picker object.

rptObj.ui.fields.cob(label=”Date”).selectable([“2019-09-01”, “2019-09-06”]) rptObj.ui.fields.cob(label=”COB Date”)

https://jqueryui.com/datepicker/

Parameters

  • label – Optional. The text of label to be added to the component

  • icon – Optional. The component icon content from font-awesome references

  • color – Optional. The font color in the component. Default inherit

  • htmlCode – Optional. An identifier for this component (on both Python and Javascript side)

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

  • options – Optional. Specific Python options available for this component

  • filters – Optional. The filtering properties for this component

  • helper – Optional. A tooltip helper

date(value, label=None, icon='far fa-calendar-alt', color=None, htmlCode=None, profile=None, options=None, helper=None)¶

This component is based on the Jquery Date Picker object.

rptObj.ui.fields.today(label=”Date”).selectable([“2019-09-01”, “2019-09-06”])

https://jqueryui.com/datepicker/

Parameters

  • value – Optional. The value to be displayed to the time component. Default now

  • label – Optional. The text of label to be added to the component

  • icon – Optional. The component icon content from font-awesome references

  • color – Optional. The font color in the component. Default inherit

  • htmlCode – Optional. An identifier for this component (on both Python and Javascript side)

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

  • options – Optional. Specific Python options available for this component

  • helper – Optional. A tooltip helper

This component is based on the Jquery Time Picker object.

rptObj.ui.fields.now(label=”timestamp”, color=”red”, helper=”This is the report timestamp”) rptObj.ui.fields.now(label=”Time field”)

https://github.com/jonthornton/jquery-timepicker

radio(value=False, label=None, group_name=None, icon=None, width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', htmlCode=None, helper=None, profile=None)¶

The <input type=”radio”> defines a radio button. Radio buttons are normally presented in radio groups (a collection of radio buttons describing a set of related options). Only one radio button in a group can be selected at the same time.

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_input_type_radio.asp

Parameters

  • value –

  • label –

  • group_name –

  • icon –

  • width –

  • height –

  • htmlCode –

  • profile –

range(value='', min=0, max=100, step=1, label=None, placeholder='', icon=None, width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', htmlCode=None, helper=None, options=None, profile=None)¶

The <input type=”range”> defines a control for entering a number whose exact value is not important (like a slider control). Default range is 0 to 100. However, you can set restrictions on what numbers are accepted with the attributes below. - max - specifies the maximum value allowed - min - specifies the minimum value allowed - step - specifies the legal number intervals - value - Specifies the default value

rptObj.ui.fields.range(54, min=20, label=”Range Example”, icon=”fas fa-unlock-alt”)

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_input_type_range.asp

Parameters

  • value –

  • min –

  • max –

  • step –

  • label –

  • placeholder –

  • icon –

  • width –

  • height –

  • htmlCode –

  • profile –

This component is based on the Jquery Time Picker object.

rptObj.ui.fields.time(label=”timestamp”, color=”red”, helper=”This is the report timestamp”) rptObj.ui.fields.time(label=”Time field”)

https://github.com/jonthornton/jquery-timepicker

Parameters

  • value – Optional. The value to be displayed to the time component. Default now

  • label – Optional. The text of label to be added to the component

  • icon – Optional. The component icon content from font-awesome references

  • color – Optional. The font color in the component. Default inherit

  • htmlCode – Optional. An identifier for this component (on both Python and Javascript side)

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

  • options – Optional. Specific Python options available for this component

  • helper – Optional. A tooltip helper
